rows.habit_details:
Handwashing is one of the ways of preventing yourself from getting sick.
It prevents the sharing of germs from one person to another, or from one person to food or water.

Cleaning the environment is the key to the existence and survival of life on planet earth. Maintaining a clean environment reduces pollution, preserves our biosphere, protects endangered species, and also helps preserve the earth's natural resources.
Food sanitation is the practice of following certain rules and procedures to prevent the contamination of food, keeping it safe to eat prevent the occurrence of food-related diseases.
